Articles.Content: You go up to floor 88. You then get thrown out of the window. You go down to floor 0 to see how you fared...

You go to floor 89 and find Chuck Norris.

He roundhouse kicks you down 5 floors.

You are now at level 84.
You go back up to floor 89 with a GUN!

You go to level 85...

You see a knife and a bazooka and you take it.
Then go down to floor 45. You shoot... Who?
You shoot all of your ghosts so far. There are quite a few. Goodness knows why, I mean you haven\'t died that many times. Have you?

You go to level 46....

you go to the elevator what takes you to level 85

OOC; Remember, guys, only 1 floor at a time.

You go to 86 and find a bigtrak
You pay Â£12 for it, then go down to the ground floor to play with it.

You pay Â£12 for it, then go down to the ground floor to play with it.

Time For Dinner go to floor 2 for your food.... Or is it a trap?? :hailprobe:
You hail a random probe at dinner (not a trap, yay) then go up to floor 50 to get a good shot on the probe...

You go to level 6

You find yourself. He is the Doctor.
You run away to floor 20. Then see...?

A man with three buttocks

Going up to level 21, you find Probert the probe

STOP RANDOMLY GOING UP/DOWN MORE THAN ONE LEVEL D:<

You go to 87 and find level 87

88, you find a 4D room, making your actual position floor I

After managing escape, you end up at floor 9.75, and using the train, you end up at 89.

89 is an armory, you find a shotgun and some ammo boxes.

You go to level 90, the moment the door opens, zombies stick their arms in to get you.

You run away from the Zombies, up to level 91, and find...

A Cake!
You attempt to eat the cake and fall through the floor, and continue falling until... no until.
...until level 92, as you were 'falling' with a pair of rocket boots strapped to your feet. On 92, you discover more zombies, and begin unloading buckshot on the zombie masses.
But then, you get eaten! \'Tis the end! Or was it? No? Turns out this was all a dream, and you\'re in a room on floor 12.

You go to 93.

You find bears.
Turns out that floor 93 is the Medwedian Embassy. They get robbed, and you get scared off to floor 39

Turns out that floor 93 is the Medwedian Embassy. They get robbed, and you get scared off to floor 39

Please.

Stop trying to go up/down more than one floor at a time.

You go to 94 and find minecraft.

Please.

Stop trying to go up/down more than one floor at a time.

Aww...

You go up to floor 95 and find... Uhh... What?
